scripts.prisma-init: cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && cd ../..
scripts.http-start: npm run prisma-init && cd apps/http && node dist/index.js
scripts.w_1-start: npm run prisma-init && cd apps/worker_1 && npm run dev
scripts.w_2-start: npm run prisma-init && cd apps/worker_2 && npm run dev
